code: INSERT(STRING(colon), END(), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(CONTAINS(STRING(space)), ALL())))
nl: Add colon at the end of line which has space

code: INSERT(STRING(colon), START(), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(CONTAINS(STRING(space)), ALL())))
nl: Insert colon at the beginning of each line containing space

code: REMOVE(SelectString(NUMBERTOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(BETWEENCOND(STRING(colon), STRING(colon), IMM()), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: For every line, remove the number between colon and colon

code: PRINT(SelectString(LINETOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(OR(STARTSWITH(STRING(colon)), STARTSWITH(STRING(space))), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Print all lines starting with an colon or starting with space

code: INSERT(STRING(space), Position(BEFORE(LINETOKEN()), ALL()), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(CONTAINS(STRING(colon)), ALL())))
nl: If sentence contain colon as a substring add space before the sentence

code: SEQ(REMOVE(SelectString(STRING(colon), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL()))), REMOVE(SelectString(STRING(space), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL()))))
nl: Remove all colon and remove all space

code: PRINT(SelectString(LINETOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(CONTAINS(STRING(colon)), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Print all lines in the file containing the string colon

code: INSERT(STRING(colon), START(), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(NOT(CONTAINS(STRING(colon))), ALL())))
nl: Add colon at the beginning of each statement if colon is not present.

code: REMOVE(SelectString(CHARTOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(AFTERCOND(STRING(colon), IMM()), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: In each line remove all the characters after colon

code: REMOVE(SelectString(LINETOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(MATCHES(STRING(colon)), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Delete lines that match regular expression pattern colon

code: REMOVE(SelectString(DIGITTOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Remove all the digits

code: INSERT(STRING(colon), START(), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Append a colon to the beginning

code: INSERT(STRING(colon), START(), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(NOT(STARTSWITH(STRING(colon))), ALL())))
nl: Insert colon before every line that does not start with colon.

code: REMOVE(SelectString(BLANKLINETOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Remove any empty line

code: INSERT(STRING(colon), Position(BETWEEN(WORDTOKEN(), WORDTOKEN()), ALL()), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Place colon between word and word in each line

code: REMOVE(SelectString(LINETOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), LASTFEW(INTEGER(2)))), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Delete the last 2 lines of the input

code: INSERT(STRING(colon), Position(BEFORE(WORDTOKEN()), IntegerSet(INTEGER(1))), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Put colon before the 1st word

code: INSERT(STRING(colon), Position(AFTER(CHARTOKEN()), IntegerSet(INTEGER(80))), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Add a colon after the 80th character in each line

code: INSERT(STRING(colon), END(), IterationScope(WORDSCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Add colon to words

code: REMOVE(SelectString(DIGITTOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), IntegerSet(INTEGER(4), INTEGER(5), INTEGER(6)))), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Remove 4th, 5th and 6th digits from all lines

code: PRINT(SelectString(WORDTOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(AFTERCOND(STRING(colon), IMM()), IntegerSet(INTEGER(1)))), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Extract the word immediately following the 1st colon

code: INSERT(STRING(colon), END(), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), EVERY(INTEGER(2), INTEGER(1)))))
nl: At the end of every 2nd line, add colon

code: REMOVE(SelectString(NUMBERTOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), IntegerSet(INTEGER(2)))), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Remove 2nd number from each line

code: REPLACE(SelectString(STRING(colon), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())), BY(STRING(space)), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Replace colon with space

code: INSERT(STRING(colon), START(), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Insert colon in the beginning in every line

code: REMOVE(SelectString(BLANKLINETOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(BEFORECOND(NONBLANKLINETOKEN(), IMM()), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Remove blanklines before the nonblankline of text

code: INSERT(STRING(colon), Position(AFTER(NUMBERTOKEN()), ALL()), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Insert colon in every line after the numbers

code: REMOVE(SelectString(STRING(colon), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(AFTERCOND(LINE(STRING(space)), IMM()), ALL())))
nl: Remove the string colon from every line whose immediately following line is space

code: REMOVE(SelectString(NUMBERTOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Delete all the numeric part of the text

code: REPLACE(SelectString(STRING(colon), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())), BY(STRING(space)), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), LASTFEW(INTEGER(2)))))
nl: Substitute colon with space in the last 2 lines

code: REMOVE(SelectString(CHARTOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(BETWEENCOND(STRING(colon), STRING(colon), IMM()), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Eliminate all the characters between colon and colon

code: INSERT(STRING(colon), Position(BEFORE(WORDTOKEN()), IntegerSet(INTEGER(1))), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Add colon before 1st word

code: REMOVE(SelectString(WORDTOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), IntegerSet(INTEGER(1)))), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(STARTSWITH(NUMBERTOKEN()), ALL())))
nl: Remove the 1st word of the line which starts with a number

code: INSERT(STRING(colon), START(), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Place colon before every line

code: REPLACE(SelectString(TEXTTOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(BETWEENCOND(STRING(colon), STRING(space), IMM()), ALL())), BY(WORD(STRING(dollar))), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Replace the text between colon and space with the word dollar

code: REMOVE(SelectString(BLANKLINETOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Delete all empty lines

code: PRINT(SelectString(TEXTTOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(BEFORECOND(STRING(colon), IMM()), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Extract everything before next colon

code: INSERT(STRING(colon), Position(AFTER(STRING(space)), IntegerSet(INTEGER(1))), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Insert colon after the 1st occurrence of space

code: INSERT(STRING(colon), Position(BETWEEN(LINETOKEN(), LINETOKEN()), ALL()), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Add an additional colon between line and line

code: REMOVE(SelectString(NUMBERTOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Remove the numbers from each line

code: REPLACE(SelectString(STRING(colon), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())), BY(STRING(space)), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Substitute colon with space

code: REPLACE(SelectString(STRING(colon), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())), BY(STRING(space)), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Replace colon with space

code: REMOVE(SelectString(BLANKLINETOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Delete all blank lines from the input

code: REPLACE(SelectString(TEXTTOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(BETWEENCOND(STRING(colon), STRING(colon), IMM()), ALL())), BY(STRING(dollar)), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Replace what is between colon and colon with dollar

code: INSERT(STRING(colon), Position(AFTER(LINETOKEN()), ALL()), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), EVERY(INTEGER(2), STARTFROM(INTEGER(2))))))
nl: Insert colon at the end of every 2nd line starting from the 2nd line.

code: REMOVE(SelectString(NUMBERTOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), IntegerSet(INTEGER(2)))), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Delete the 2nd number from each line.

code: REMOVE(SelectString(LINETOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), IntegerSet(INTEGER(3), INTEGER(4)))), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Remove the 3rd and 4th line

code: REMOVE(SelectString(NUMBERTOKEN(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())), IterationScope(LINESCOPE(), BConditionOccurrence(ALWAYS(), ALL())))
nl: Remove the numbers from all the lines
